channel.title: What do i type when im in compile edit? the server is pvpscape! please help!
channel.description:
ok i had this after a frined told me how to do.... then my whle server crashed so now i dont know what to put DONT TELL ME TO PUT WHAT IT SAYS IN THE TUT (1 of the first 4 permenent posts) IT SAYS TO PUT @echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
BUT THAT DOESNT WORK ON PVPSCAPE PLEASE HELP ME ON WHAT TO PUT SO IT SAYS Note: stream.java users or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:Deprecation for details. Press any key to continue . . .
[font=Verdana]SO CAN SOME! PLEASE HELP ON TELLING ME WHAT TO TYPE IN COMPILE <EDIT !!IN PVPSCAPE SERVER!! NOT ANY OTHER SERVER UNLESS U KNOW FOR SURE IT WORKS FOR PVPSCAPE ALSO[/font]
if u can, help me on msn or yahoo my email is ahr_az@yahoo.com also if it doesnt show, thats an underscore between the ahr an az

item.title: What do i type when im in compile edit? the server is pvpscape! please help!
item.dc:creator: @alex2916s alex2916s
item.description:
@alex2916s wrote:

wait what? i have jdk1.6.0 in my java file also jre1.6.0 in my java folder
heres how it goes
start<c drive<program files<java then jdk1.6.0 an jre1.6.0 r in that folder[br][size=1]Posted on: February 11, 2007, 12:57:57 AM[/size][hr]any1 have msn or yahoo that can help on there? add me my email is ahr_az@yahoo.com also if it doesnt show its a underscore between ahr an az[br][size=1]Posted on: February 11, 2007, 01:01:37 AM[/size][hr]SOME! GIMME AWNSERS!

item.title: What do i type when im in compile edit? the server is pvpscape! please help!
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

Stop double posting anyways that should work ill give you this

@echo off COLOR 0c title yourservername Client "C:\Program Files\Java\yourjavatype\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

there just fix the yourservername and the yourjavatype and then your good

@echo off
title Compiler
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
